# Magic Room

> AI-powered interior design tool that transforms room photos into styled redesigns in 30–60 seconds using Google Gemini multimodal AI. Photos are processed in-memory and never stored.

Magic Room is a web application for AI interior design. Users upload a photo of any room, choose a design style and room type, and receive AI-generated design variations. The service processes images in-memory only — no uploaded photos are retained on servers.

## Core Facts

- **AI model**: Google Gemini multimodal AI via OpenRouter — understands room geometry and spatial relationships, not just style overlays
- **Design styles**: Modern, Scandinavian, Industrial, Bohemian, Luxury, Minimalist, Tropical, Vintage, Japandi, Art Deco, Coastal, Farmhouse, Mediterranean, Transitional (14 total)
- **Room types**: Living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, dining room, home office, gaming room, nursery, laundry room, basement, sunroom, home theater, mudroom, walk-in closet (14 total)
- **Total combinations**: 196 AI design pages across all style + room combinations
- **Privacy**: Images processed in-memory only, never stored, never used for training
- **Generation time**: 30–60 seconds per design session
- **Output**: 4–8 design variations per generation
- **Pricing**: One-time credit packages from EUR 9.99, no subscription required, credits never expire
- **Free trial**: 1 free credit with every account — no payment card required

## Key Pages

- [Homepage](https://magic-room.dev): Product overview, how it works, free trial
- [Generate designs](https://magic-room.dev/generate): Upload room photo, select style and room type, generate AI redesigns
- [Pricing](https://magic-room.dev/pricing): Credit packages — Starter (EUR 9.99), Growth (EUR 19.99), Premium (EUR 29.99)
- [AI design ideas](https://magic-room.dev/design): Browse 196 AI design combinations across 14 styles and 14 room types

## Competitor Comparisons

- [All alternatives](https://magic-room.dev/alternatives): How Magic Room compares to popular AI interior design tools
- [Magic Room vs RoomGPT](https://magic-room.dev/vs/roomgpt): Side-by-side on AI model, privacy, pricing, output quality
- [RoomGPT alternative](https://magic-room.dev/alternatives/roomgpt): Detailed comparison with RoomGPT
- [DecorAI alternative](https://magic-room.dev/alternatives/decorai): Detailed comparison with DecorAI
- [Reimagine Home alternative](https://magic-room.dev/alternatives/reimaginehome): Detailed comparison with Reimagine Home
- [Interior AI alternative](https://magic-room.dev/alternatives/interior-ai): Detailed comparison with Interior AI

## Differentiators vs Competitors

| Feature | Magic Room | Most Competitors |
|---------|-----------|-----------------|
| AI model | Google Gemini multimodal AI | Diffusion-based models |
| Image storage | Never stored — in-memory processing | Images stored on servers |
| Credits expire | No | Monthly reset on most plans |
| Pricing | One-time packages from EUR 9.99 | Subscription required |
| Room structure accuracy | High — architectural geometry preserved | Variable |
